Oracles.Description: Shift focus to someone or something else.
Destroy something, or render it useless.
Use the terrain to gain advantage.
Leverage the advantage of a weapon or ability.
The ritual has the opposite affect.
An ally, companion or friend is adversely affected.
A horror is drawn to you like a moth to a flame.
You collapse, and drift into a troubled sleep.
You undergo a physical torment which leaves its mark upon you.
Ghostly voices whisper of dark portents. Envision what they tell you.
You are lost in shadow, and find yourself in another placewithout memory of how you got there. Envision your new surroundings.
You alert someone or something to your presence.
You are not yourself, and act against a friend, ally or companion. Envision what you do and how they respond.
You affect or damage your surroundings, causing a disturbance or potential harm.
Creatures exhibit strange or aggressive behavior.
You lose your connection to magic for a day or so, and cannot perform rituals.
The ritual affects the target in an unexpected and problematic way.
The ritual reveals a surprising and troubling truth.
You are tempted by dark powers. Envision what you are shown.
A horrifying vision manifests. Envision what you see.
Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.
An assumption is revealed to be false.
A more dangerous foe is revealed.
You and an enemy share a common goal.
You are betrayed by someone who was trusted.
The truth of a relationship is revealed.
Two seemingly unrelated situations are shown to be connected.
Unexpected powers or abilities are revealed.
Roll again, but the situation is dire.
Why are \_\_\_ and \_\_\_ fighting right now?
\_\_\_ enters the scene. How does this complicate things?
By whom is \_\_\_ being chased, and why?
What perilous situation is \_\_\_ escaping right now?
What awkward social situation is \_\_\_ currently caught in?
What is \_\_\_ here to collect from \_\_\_?
\_\_\_ is dying and \_\_\_ is there. What happened?
What trap has \_\_\_ sprung, and who set it?
To whom is \_\_\_ tearfully or angrily apologizing right now?
\_\_\_ and \_\_\_ are at a standstill. What happened?
Genderfluid person (he or she or they)
Genderqueer person (he or she or they or other)
Roll again and apply that result but make it worse. If you roll this result yet again, think of something dreadful that changes the course of your quest (Ask the Oracle if unsure) and make it happen.
A person or community you trusted loses faith in you, or acts against you.
A person or community you care about is exposed to danger.
You are separated from something or someone.
Your action has an unintended effect.
Something of value is lost or destroyed.
A new danger or foe is revealed.
It causes a delay or puts you at a disadvantage.
A surprising development complicates your quest.
It forces you to act against your best intentions.
A friend, companion, or ally is put in harm’s way (or you are, if alone).
Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.

Oracles.Prompt: Envision what it is. What makes it unusual or distinctive?
What is it? Why is it important to this settlement’s history?
Why have the people of this settlement chosen this creature as their totem? How is it represented in art or rituals?
What happened here? What place or practice commemorates this event?

Oracles.Description: A word in an Old World language
Oracles.Prompt: What culture is represented by this word? What does it translate to?
What influence does the weather have on this settlement?

Oracles.Description: A founder or famous settler (Kei's Hall)
